title: Unlock a skin for friend
body: I was Unlock Arcade Riven for my friend, it was 1350RP but now it was On Sale and it only need 975, so I was Unlock this skin for my friend, but when I unlock it, it use my 1350RP on it !!!!!!  when I want to sent a give for it, this skin was at On Sale area.

replies.body:
Hey Gevin Lin -

We announce all sales for the month in advance [on our website](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/february-sales-schedule). Because sales are announced in advance, we won't be offering partial refunds on skins or champions that are purchased before the sales. Sorry about that!
Katey, the way I read this thread was that they bought Arcade Riven for a friend but they were charged the full amount instead of the sale amount.

Ah, gotcha.

Okay, if that's the case, they'll need to [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look at the transaction history and we can make any needed adjustments. ^-^

You should contact customer support.

There's nothing anyone can do here for you;  This board is just for collecting bug reports.
